attributes.action: Accept Ukrainian refugees seeking asylum in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We have an obligation to help Ukrainian people while they’re fighting a war in Europe that keeps other countries safe. The civilians must be protected and reunited with their families.
attributes.background: Due to the war in Ukraine thousands of Ukrainians fleeing the country and at the moment they can’t reunite with their families in the UK. The government of the UK pledged to help Ukrainian people and should enable a process for Ukrainians to get a fast track visa in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
